explanations.machine learning: The paper employs machine learning techniques, specifically deep learning models, for stock selection and portfolio optimization.
explanations.deep learning: The study uses deep learning models, including convolutional neural networks and bi-directional recurrent neural networks, to predict stock trends.
explanations.neural network: The paper utilizes neural networks, such as CNNs and bi-directional RNNs, as part of its hybrid system for stock selection.
explanations.convolutional neural network: The system employs a convolutional neural network (CNN) in combination with other models to predict stock trends.
explanations.CNN: CNN is explicitly mentioned as one of the models used for stock trend prediction in the hybrid system.
explanations.recurrent neural network: The paper uses a bi-directional recurrent neural network (RNN) as part of its approach to predict stock trends.
